name: Drip LD48
description:
Solo game made in 24 hours.

Simple on the surface, complicated under the hood.

Use Left Mouse Click to select your orb.

If it falls onto a platform you survive the drip and continue

If you miss you start all the way back at the start.

Each decision you make changes what is to come. Infinte branches of possibility. There might be an end, but I expect it goes on forever.

It remembers your last moves with a little red arrow. Learn from the best, you!

Play for glory and post your best drip!

Peace TheSoulSelector
